The segment-statistics enable command enables traffic statistics collection for an EPG.
The undo segment-statistics enable command disables traffic statistics collection for an EPG. The segment-statistics enable command enables traffic statistics collection for an EPG. The undo segment-statistics enable command disables traffic statistics collection for an EPG. By default, traffic statistics collection is disabled for an EPG. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
